document.full_text: new york city's immigrants contribute $200 billion to the city economy every year and represent one-third of managerial and professional workers, mayor michael bloomberg said on monday.
document.title: new york immigrants boost city economy by $200 billion
lines_and_colors: new york city's immigrants contribute $200 billion to the city economy every year and represent one-third of managerial and professional workers, mayor michael bloomberg said on monday.
